description.zh-cn: 中国农民及政治人物。在文化大革命期间受毛泽东提拔，成为“农业学大寨”运动的代表人物，并曾担任至中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理等副国级职务。改革开放后因其政治路线与邓小平等人的政策相抵触而被免职。
description.en: A Chinese farmer and politician. During the Cultural Revolution, he was promoted by Mao Zedong and became the representative figure of the 'In agriculture, learn from Dazhai' movement. He held high-ranking positions such as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council. After the Reform and Opening-up, he was dismissed from his posts due to his political line conflicting with the policies of Deng Xiaoping and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。他发起了“农业学大寨”运动，并在文革期间提拔了陈永贵。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He initiated the 'In agriculture, learn from Dazhai' movement and promoted Chen Yonggui during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 一项由毛泽东发起的政治运动，号召全国农村学习山西省昔阳县大寨村的生产模式和奋斗精神。陈永贵是该运动的核心人物。
description.en: A political movement initiated by Mao Zedong, calling on all rural areas in China to learn from the production model and struggling spirit of Dazhai Village in Xiyang County, Shanxi Province. Chen Yonggui was the central figure of this movement.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，对中国社会造成了深远影响。陈永贵在此期间获得提拔，进入中共中央领导层。
description.en: A political movement launched and led by Mao Zedong that had a profound impact on Chinese society. Chen Yonggui was promoted during this period and entered the central leadership of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人，改革开放的总设计师。他主导的拨乱反正和改革开放政策与陈永贵的政治路线相抵触，导致后者下台。
description.en: The paramount leader of the second generation of the People's Republic of China and the chief architect of the Reform and Opening-up policy. The policies of Boluan Fanzheng and Reform and Opening-up that he led conflicted with Chen Yonggui's political line, leading to the latter's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，由邓小平主导的旨在纠正文革错误的思想和政治运动。该运动导致了陈永贵及其代表的政治路线的终结。
description.en: A period of thought and political movement led by Deng Xiaoping after the end of the Cultural Revolution, aimed at correcting its mistakes. This movement led to the end of the political line represented by Chen Yonggui.

description.zh-cn: 由邓小平倡导的经济改革和社会开放政策。陈永贵对此政策持抵触态度。
description.en: An economic reform and social opening policy advocated by Deng Xiaoping. Chen Yonggui was resistant to this policy.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央主席和总书记。他曾批评陈永贵的大寨模式为“劳民伤财”，与陈永贵发生政治冲突。
description.en: Former Chairman and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. He criticized Chen Yonggui's Dazhai model as 'wasting manpower and resources', leading to political conflict with Chen.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东逝世后的中华人民共和国最高领导人。陈永贵曾劝说他不要让邓小平复出。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China after Mao Zedong's death. Chen Yonggui once advised him not to allow Deng Xiaoping to return to power.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。他在文化大革命期间曾接见陈永贵，并授意他组织自己的红卫兵。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. During the Cultural Revolution, he met with Chen Yonggui and suggested that he organize his own Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任山西省委第一书记。他与陈永贵存在政治矛盾，曾试图以陈的历史问题攻击他，但因毛泽东支持陈而未果。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and former First Secretary of the Shanxi Provincial Party Committee. He had political conflicts with Chen Yonggui and attempted to attack him based on his historical issues, but failed due to Mao Zedong's support for Chen.

description.zh-cn: 曾任山西省委书记。在文化大革命期间，他与陈永贵结成政治同盟，共同组织造反派“总站派”。
description.en: Former Secretary of the Shanxi Provincial Party Committee. During the Cultural Revolution, he formed a political alliance with Chen Yonggui, and they jointly organized the rebel faction 'Zongzhanpai'.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨共产党（红色高棉）总书记，民主柬埔寨最高领导人。他曾访问大寨，并接待了回访柬埔寨的陈永贵。
description.en: General Secretary of the Communist Party of Kampuchea (Khmer Rouge) and the paramount leader of Democratic Kampuchea. He visited Dazhai and hosted Chen Yonggui during his return visit to Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨共产党在1975年至1979年间的执政时期的通称。陈永贵曾访问其治下的柬埔寨并对其共产主义实践表示赞赏。
description.en: The common name for the Communist Party of Kampuchea during its rule from 1975 to 1979. Chen Yonggui visited Cambodia under its rule and expressed appreciation for its communist practices.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构，陈永贵曾是其成员。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China, of which Chen Yonggui was once a member.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央人民政府，陈永贵曾担任副总理。
description.en: The central government of the People's Republic of China, where Chen Yonggui served as Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间山西省的权力机构，陈永贵曾担任副主任。
description.en: The power organ of Shanxi Province during the Cultural Revolution, where Chen Yonggui served as Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山西省昔阳县的村庄，是陈永贵的家乡，也是“农业学大寨”运动的样板。
description.en: A village in Xiyang County, Shanxi Province, China, which is the hometown of Chen Yonggui and the model for the 'In agriculture, learn from Dazhai' movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。陈永贵在此逝世。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China. Chen Yonggui passed away here.

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵出生于山西省昔阳县大寨。
description.en: Chen Yonggui was born in Dazhai, Xiyang County, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东号召“农业学大寨”，并在文化大革命期间肯定和提拔陈永贵，使其进入中共中央领导层。
description.en: Mao Zedong launched the 'In agriculture, learn from Dazhai' campaign and affirmed and promoted Chen Yonggui during the Cultural Revolution, enabling him to enter the central leadership of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵在文化大革命期间获得毛泽东的肯定，政治地位迅速提升，最终进入中共中央领导层。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Chen Yonggui gained Mao Zedong's approval, and his political status rose rapidly, eventually entering the central leadership of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 作为“农业学大寨”运动的核心人物和典范，陈永贵的政治声望和地位因此运动而达到顶峰。
description.en: As the core figure and model of the 'In agriculture, learn from Dazhai' movement, Chen Yonggui's political prestige and status reached their peak due to this movement.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1964年发出了“农业学大寨”的号召，推动了该运动在全国范围内的开展。
description.en: In 1964, Mao Zedong issued the call to 'learn from Dazhai in agriculture,' promoting the movement nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平主导的拨乱反正和改革开放时期，陈永贵的政治路线被否定，并于1980年9月被迫辞去国务院副总理职务。
description.en: During the period of Boluan Fanzheng and Reform and Opening-up led by Deng Xiaoping, Chen Yonggui's political line was repudiated, and he was forced to resign from his position as Vice Premier of the State Council in September 1980.

description.zh-cn: 拨乱反正运动否定了文化大革命时期的极左路线，直接导致了以陈永贵为代表的“大寨模式”的终结及其本人的下台。
description.en: The Boluan Fanzheng movement negated the ultra-left line of the Cultural Revolution, directly leading to the end of the 'Dazhai model' represented by Chen Yonggui and his own downfall.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放推行的新政策与陈永贵坚持的集体化路线根本对立，导致其政治生涯的结束。
description.en: The new policies implemented by the Reform and Opening-up were fundamentally opposed to the collectivization line that Chen Yonggui adhered to, leading to the end of his political career.

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵曾劝说华国锋不要让邓小平复出，并在邓小平复出后极力反对其改革开放政策，并当面质问其是否还执行毛主席路线。
description.en: Chen Yonggui advised Hua Guofeng not to rehabilitate Deng Xiaoping. After Deng's return, Chen strongly opposed his Reform and Opening-up policies and confronted him about whether he was still following Chairman Mao's revolutionary line.

description.zh-cn: 因胡耀邦批评大寨模式是“劳民伤财”，陈永贵辱骂胡耀邦为“狗日的”和“胡乱邦”。
description.en: After Hu Yaobang criticized the Dazhai model as 'wasting manpower and resources,' Chen Yonggui insulted him, calling him a 'son of a bitch' and 'Hu Luanbang' (Hu the reckless).

description.zh-cn: 1967年，周恩来在接见陈永贵时授意他可以组织自己的红卫兵，在政治上支持了陈永贵。
description.en: In 1967, when meeting with Chen Yonggui, Zhou Enlai suggested that he could organize his own Red Guards, providing him with political support.

description.zh-cn: 时任山西一把手的谢振华与陈永贵在农业政策上存在分歧，并一直想以陈永贵的历史问题为借口将他整下台。
description.en: Xie Zhenhua, then the top leader in Shanxi, had disagreements with Chen Yonggui on agricultural policy and had been trying to use Chen's historical issues as a pretext to bring him down.

description.zh-cn: 由于毛泽东支持陈永贵，与陈永贵有矛盾的谢振华被调离山西，其整治陈永贵的计划也因此落空。
description.en: Due to Mao Zedong's support for Chen Yonggui, Xie Zhenhua, who had conflicts with Chen, was transferred out of Shanxi, and his plans to persecute Chen were thwarted.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，陈永贵与原山西省委书记刘格平结成同盟，共同组织造反派“总站派”以争夺山西政权。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Chen Yonggui formed an alliance with the former Shanxi Provincial Party Secretary Liu Geping to jointly organize the rebel faction 'Zongzhanpai' to seize power in Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 1977年9月，波尔布特访问大寨。同年12月，陈永贵回访柬埔寨，波尔布特陪同其访问。
description.en: In September 1977, Pol Pot visited Dazhai. In December of the same year, Chen Yonggui paid a return visit to Cambodia, accompanied by Pol Pot.

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵在访问由红色高棉统治的柬埔寨后，对其共产主义实践表示赞赏，认为“马列、毛主席还没实现的共产主义，人家柬埔寨实现了”。
description.en: After visiting Cambodia under the rule of the Khmer Rouge, Chen Yonggui praised its communist practices, stating, 'The communism that Marx, Lenin, and Chairman Mao have not yet achieved, Cambodia has achieved.'

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵于1948年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Chen Yonggui joined the Communist Party of China in 1948.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵于中共十届和十一届期间担任中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chen Yonggui served as a member of the Politburo during the 10th and 11th Central Committees of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵于第四届和第五届全国人民代表大会期间担任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chen Yonggui served as Vice Premier of the State Council during the 4th and 5th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵自1967年起担任山西省革命委员会副主任。
description.en: Chen Yonggui served as Vice Chairman of the Shanxi Provincial Revolutionary Committee starting in 1967.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 作为中央政治局委员，陈永贵在党内是时任中共中央主席毛泽东的下属。
description.en: As a member of the Politburo, Chen Yonggui was a subordinate of the then CPC Chairman Mao Zedong within the party.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 作为国务院副总理，陈永贵在政府体系中是时任总理周恩来的下属。
description.en: As Vice Premier of the State Council, Chen Yonggui was a subordinate of the then Premier Zhou Enlai in the government system.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理
position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任国务院总理和中共中央主席期间，陈永贵是其在政府和党内的下属。
description.en: During Hua Guofeng's tenure as Premier of the State Council and Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Yonggui was his subordinate in both the government and the party.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在胡耀邦担任中共中央主席期间，陈永贵作为政治局委员是其党内下属。
description.en: During Hu Yaobang's tenure as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Yonggui, as a Politburo member, was his subordinate within the party.
